profile.name: Steve Klabnik
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at East River Source Control
profile.summary: Highly skilled developer with a diverse range of interests and skills in programming languages such as Rust, Ruby, TypeScript, JavaScript, MDX, and Go. Proven track record of working on experimental projects and contributing to open-source initiatives.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed snapshot testing and trie-based data structures for improved coding efficiency.
Implemented memory upgrades for coding agents to enhance performance.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Worked on experimental package managers and doubly linked lists.
Contribution to open-source projects, including custom instructions for ChatGPT.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open-source repositories.
Contributed to the development of software build labour-saving devices.
